mapper.sql: /*[TbbsDocAddItmInf.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT MODL_SEQ , DOC_SEQ , DOC_ITM_VAL , EID , VAR_SEQ , LANG_CD , CD , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TBBS_DOC_ADD_ITM_INF WHERE DOC_SEQ = #{doc_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND LANG_CD = #{lang_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MODL_SEQ = #{modl_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND VAR_SEQ = #{var_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
